short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension designed to help dyslexic people read text on websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have a hard time reading on websites?

With this simple, easy-to-use Chrome extension you can edit the background color, text color, link color, font size, and so much more to make it easier to read!

In all seriousness, reading text on some websites can be very hard for dyslexic people or elders, this extension was designed to make life easier for you. Enjoy!
